# Compiled Shaders

This directory contains auto-generated shader binaries.

**Do not edit files in this directory manually.**

Shaders are compiled from `shaders/src/` using `tools/compile_shaders.py`.

## Formats

- `spirv/` - SPIR-V for Vulkan backend
- `metal/` - Metal library for macOS/iOS
- `dxil/` - DXIL for D3D12 on Windows
